    • getVersion

      public Version getVersion()
      Description copied from class: AbstractSchema
      Return VersionNewDatabase instance for new database. Return VersionIndeterminate instance for database where version can't be determined. Return VersionNumber instance for database version.
      Specified by:
      getVersion in class AbstractSchema
      Returns:
      The Version.

    • getTransaction

      protected UpdateTransaction getTransaction()
      Description copied from class: AbstractSchema
      Obtain a new transaction. Within setup(...), each update obtained from @getUpdates() will run, followed by updating version via setVersion(...) in its own UpdateTransaction.
      Overrides:
      getTransaction in class AbstractSchema
      Returns:
      UpdateTransaction.

    • setVersion

      protected Result setVersion​(VersionNumber number)
      Description copied from class: AbstractSchema
      Set new version number after successful update. Normally not called directly; only by setup(...)
      Specified by:
      setVersion in class AbstractSchema
      Parameters:
      number - - version number
      Returns:
      Result

    • create

      protected Result create()
      Description copied from class: AbstractSchema
      Create and initialise a new schema. Typically only contains version store, because it is assumed that updates will be run to create other content.
      Specified by:
      create in class AbstractSchema
      Returns:
      Result
